categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A member of the Jedi Order, this Jedi served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic as a General in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars.

A Force-sensitive Human trained in the ways of the Force by the Jedi Order, he constructed a green-bladed lightsaber by the time the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems declared war. Taking up the rank of General in the Grand Army of the Republic, he led clone troopers in at least one battle; he assisted clone trooper Denal during the battle of Orto Plutonia. Together, the Jedi and clone rescued Padawan Ahsoka Tano from a Confederate prison established on the world.

This Jedi's only appearance was in Star Wars: The Clone Wars mobile game.
During the events shown in the wireless game, the main character, Denal sometimes encounters a Jedi. At one point during the game, this Jedi appears right after the player receives a message from Obi-Wan Kenobi. Also, he knows both Anakin Skywalker and Ahsoka Tano, and he is important enough for Skywalker to risk and send his Padawan alone to assist him. However, this character is called just "Jedi" in the dialogue windows and wears a hood, making it impossible to identify him with Kenobi.
